Package org.parosproxy.paros.control

Class Control

java.lang.Object
org.parosproxy.paros.control.AbstractControl
org.parosproxy.paros.control.Control
All Implemented Interfaces:
SessionListener
public class Control extends AbstractControl implements SessionListener
Overall control with interaction on model and view.

    • setExitStatus

      public void setExitStatus(int exitStatus, String logMessage)
      Sets the value ZAP will exit cleanly with. ZAP may still exit with a non-zero value if a serious error occurs. This will work however ZAP is run but it makes more sense if ZAP is run in cmdline mode.
      Parameters:
      exitStatus - the value ZAP will exit with
      logMessage - the message that will be logged at info level
      Since:
      2.11.0

      Note: Not part of the public API.

      Parameters:
      model - the Model to test with.
      extensionLoader - the ExtensionLoader to test with.

    • persistSessionProperties

      public void persistSessionProperties() throws Exception
      Persists the properties (e.g. name, description) of the current session.

      Should be called only by "core" classes.

      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurred while persisting the properties.
      Since:
      2.7.0

      Parameters:
